entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -21.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -25.4°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
